summary: Completed frontend testing of 4 new dashboard pages (Catalog, Revenue, Procurement, Governance) and verified 5 list pages (Lead, Items, Items Create, Policies, Customers). All dashboards load correctly with stats cards, module cards, and navigation. All list pages display professional enterprise design with proper data-testid attributes.

elements_verified: 4 stat cards (Total Items, Active Items, Pricing Rules, Total Value)
5 module cards (Items, Pricing, Costing, Rules, Packages)
4 stat cards (Total Revenue, Active Contracts, Evaluations, Pending Commits)
4 stat cards (Total Spend, Active Contracts, Evaluations, Pending Reviews)
4 stat cards (Active Policies, Critical Risks, Pending Audits, Authorities)
5 module cards (Policies, Limits, Authority, Risks, Audits)
Form fields: item_code, name, description, category, unit_of_measure, base_price, cost_price, tax_category, status

dashboards.consistent_layout: VERIFIED - All dashboards use same layout pattern
dashboards.stat_cards: VERIFIED - 4 stat cards with icons, values, and trend indicators
dashboards.module_cards: VERIFIED - Clickable cards with hover effects and navigation
dashboards.loading_states: VERIFIED - All dashboards show loading spinner while fetching data

list_pages.table_layout: VERIFIED - Clean tables with proper headers
list_pages.status_badges: VERIFIED - Colored dots with status text

critical_code_review_comments: All 4 dashboard pages follow consistent design patterns with proper data-testid attributes
All pages use REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL from environment for API calls
All pages have proper loading states with spinner
Module cards on dashboards correctly navigate to their respective list pages
Items Create form has all required fields and proper validation
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 4 new dashboard pages (Catalog, Revenue, Procurement, Governance) have been verified with proper stats, module cards, and navigation. Dashboard routes: /commerce/catalog, /commerce/revenue, /commerce/procure, /commerce/govern. All module cards navigate correctly to their respective list pages. Items Create form at /commerce/catalog/items/create is fully functional with all form fields working.
